thread.title: Andrew Sollinger Named Publisher of Foreign Policy

author: cnbc.com
title: Andrew Sollinger Named Publisher of Foreign Policy
text:
ARLINGTON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Graham Holdings Company (NYSE:GHC), announced today that Andrew Sollinger has been named Publisher of Foreign Policy. Sollinger will immediately assume responsibility for all business side operations, including advertising, circulation, events and all other revenue-producing ventures, except Foreign Policy Analytics , which will continue to be run by Claire Casey.
Sollinger was executive vice president of subscriptions at Business Insider. Sollinger has had a distinguished career at Politico’s Capital New York (now Politico New York), the Financial Times, Money Media and Thomson Media.
“Andrew’s experiences as a journalist, and in circulation, business development, strategy, marketing, research and new ventures make him uniquely skilled to lead FP’s business,” said Ann McDaniel, interim chief executive officer of Foreign Policy. “We are delighted to have him join our team.”
